system.effect: Contains cogitators, documentation, and so on, Doesn't need of aid of the Mechanicus to operate (although that would be heretical). +20 to Identify, Analyse, and Repair ancient or xenos artifacts, as well as tests to craft single items. Example tests include Scholastic Lore, Forbidden Lore, Tech-Use, and Trade Tests (GM Fiat, may include others). One per vessel.
